column5: I was just browsing youtube and came across this, it's not something I would feel to comfortable trying if I even would lol the guys nuts.
If anyone ever hears me say "Boo Ya".....shoot me !

Man, I wish I could find a place where I just keep pulling them out like that.  This guy in the vid reminds me of one of my uncles, even his voice is similar in some ways. But my uncle doesn't say "Boo yah!," at least not that I've heard.  Thanks for sharing anyhow, it was entertaining. I think I'd give that a shot, actually.
Thanks for sharing...that is awesome!  I'd love to get into the everglades someday

I would love get into the everglades as well to do some large mouth fishing but not a chance would i be doing it from shore like that guy is at least not in a remote populated gator spot.  Dana if your ever down in my area let me know i can pull smallies in like that out at my parents.
Heh, cool, thanks for the invite. I'll keep it in mind, but in all honesty, I don't get out all that much. The last time I was even close was to see Iron Maiden in 2006 in Toronto.
